author: 383beachbum
title: Fantastic hotel.
text:
Mom/daughter spring break trip for a week in early March. Loved this hotel!! On arrival we were told that we'd been upgraded to a larger room in what I think is the newer updated part of the hotel. Decor in lobby, restaurant and rooms is just gorgeous. Very modern. Hotel is cozy (like everything in Rome - especially the many small and cozy restaurants). Room was small but gorgeous and beds/linen were very comfy. Bathroom was quite fancy. Included a modern bidet which was nice. Amazing and helpful staff -Nadia especially went above and beyond to recommend restaurants and help with sightseeing ideas and book our tours, always wore a friendly smile - she stood out but all the staff were just amazing, friendly and very competent. We ate breakfast at the hotel daily (it was included in our rate). It was delicious, healthy, lots of fresh fruit, great variety of hot dishes and pastries, and the wait staff was amazing - very professional! Hotel is in a great area - central - short walk to Colosseum and other sites. Public transportation is very easy, accessible, close to hotel. Close to lots of fabulous shopping. An overall great experience. Would definitely recommend this hotel and would stay there again if return to Rome.
